title: Tresaith to Penbryn Walk Route

images.title: Nick Earl / Waterfall on Tresaith Beach
images.caption: Waterfall on Tresaith Beach. Afon Saith cascading down cliffs onto Beach at Tresaith

images.title: Tresaith beach, Ceredigion by Robin Drayton, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Tresaith beach, Ceredigion. Tresaith Beach is one of the main attractions of the village. It features a beautiful sandy shoreline and is surrounded by cliffs, creating a sheltered and scenic cove. The beach is ideal for swimming, sunbathing, and family outings.

images.title: On the Wales Coast Path near Tresaith, Ceredigion in July by Jeremy Bolwell, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: On the Wales Coast Path near Tresaith, Ceredigion in July

images.title: Oliver Dixon / Tresaith, looking east
images.caption: Tresaith, looking east. The coastline and nearby woods are rich in wildlife. Birdwatchers can spot various seabirds, and there's a chance to see seals and dolphins in the bay.

images.title: Uwchben / Above Tresaith by Alan Richards, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Uwchben

images.title: Traeth Penbryn by Maigheach-gheal, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Traeth Penbryn. Penbryn is renowned for its sandy beach, which stretches for over a mile along the coastline. The beach is ideal for swimming, sunbathing, and water sports. It is backed by rolling dunes and flanked by lush woodlands. The beach and surrounding area are managed by the National Trust, ensuring the conservation of this natural paradise.

description: This walk from the village of takes you to neighbouring Penbryn along the Ceredigion Coast Path . It's just over a mile, passing along a wonderful cliff top path with some amazing views across Cardigan Bay. There are also nice beaches at either end and a waterfall around Tresaith to admire. To continue your walk head west to visit lovely Aberporth or east towards Llangrannog .
